channel.title: CVE Feed for Yannick Lefebvre -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-24875|2024-08-16T15:35:14.323Z -- yannick%20lefebvre -- link%20library
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Yannick Lefebvre Link Library.This issue affects Link Library: from n/a through 7.5.13.

item.title: CVE-2024-35687|2024-08-02T03:14:53.983Z -- yannick%20lefebvre -- link%20library
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Yannick Lefebvre Link Library link-library allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Link Library: from n/a through 7.6.3.
